title: King of Diamonds
description: He's more than a second chance.Tina Harris is in love. Jack Carter has been nothing but honest with her and she can't turn her back on him even if she tried. When he comes to her with one final plan, one final heist, she knows that she'd agree to it and that she'd follow him anywhere in a heartbeat. She's not someone he ever has to be worried about.The realization that Tina Harris isn't a little girl out trying to impress him leaves Jack Carter more at ease about the thief that stole his heart. Slowly but surely, he finds himself finally comfortable with giving her his love--completely and unconditionally-and dares to think about a future together with her. One last heist, one last ride, and one chance to leave their past behind.Jack will need Tina's nimble fingers more than ever if they want to pull off this final heist. And once they do, it'll be time for them to be together for good, to finally put their pasts and all the ghosts that haunt them behind. Should be simple, right?
author: Kathryn Thomas
